<includeonly>
<td style="--start: {{{start|0}}}; --end: {{{end|0}}};">{{#if:{{{data|}}}|<span class="data">{{{data}}}</span>}} {{#if:{{{tooltip|}}}|<span class="tooltip">{{{tooltip}}}</span>}}</td>
</includeonly><noinclude>
== Template:ChartsCss pie cell ==
Outputs a single `<td>` for a pie chart dataset.

=== Parameters ===
* `start`: raw CSS value for `--start`
* `end`: raw CSS value for `--end`
* `data` (optional): value shown in a `<span class="data">…</span>`
* `tooltip` (optional): tooltip content shown in a `<span class="tooltip">…</span>`
</noinclude>
